document.masterDocTitle: The bees of Lebanon (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Anthophila)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The bees of Lebanon (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Anthophila)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: WEST PALAEARCTIC: Northern and eastern Mediterranean basin north to Croatia ( Terzo & Rasmont 2011 , Ascher & Pickering 2021 ).

Flower records. Apiaceae :
Aethionema coridifolium
; Asteraceae :
Carlina curetum ssp. orientalis
; Caprifoliaceae :
Cephalaria
cf
joppensis
,
Cephalaria sp.
,
Scabiosa sp.
,
Scabiosa argentea
; Fabaceae :
Ononis natrix
,
Medicago sp.
; Lamiaceae :
Stachys distans
.
Terzo (2011) reports floral records form Asteraceae , Fabaceae , Dipsacaceae (species listed above now in Caprifoliaceae ), Lamiaceae all of which are observed in our records above.
